lines.text: You wasted a wish! I wish that burrito was stuck on your big dumb nose!

[The burrito appears on his nose]
Help! Get it off. I can't breathe nothing but burrito!
Well Sam, it looks like we'll have to use your wish to get the burrito off his nose. It's the only humane thing to do. Sam? Sam?
Too late, Duck, I already wished for a pirate ship. After I sinks a certain pesky rabbit, I'll come back and pick you up!
The only two things a pirate'll run for is money and public office.
[Taz drops the cannon, causing it to fire at Sam's face]
Ooh! I'll shiver his timbers and I'll baton his hatch and keel-haul his kuppers!
And now I say, without the jokes,

[after Taz buzzes all the feathers off the crows]
Hey! Ain't ya even gonna 'pologize?
Ooh, that rackin' frackin' rabbit. I'd like to stretch him on a rackin' frackin' wrack.
Patience is a virtue. Patience brings good luck. It is seldom found in humans, and *never* in a duck!
